data.name: Statutory Trust Account
data.description: This product is a specific purpose account for members of professional associations such as solicitors, real estate agents, conveyancers, motor dealers who are required to meet specific legal requirements when holding and managing funds on behalf of their clients.

features.additionalInfo: 15 fee-free transaction allowance and 15 fee-free cheque deposits

features.additionalValue: Stay up to date : SMS and email alerts to keep track of your account activity.

features.additionalInfo: Helps you comply with statutory requirements when holding clients' funds in trust

If you are a solicitor, real estate agent, collection agent (QLD), conveyancer, or settlement agent (WA), you may be required by law to deposit funds held on behalf of your clients, into a Statutory Trust Account. This is a special type of account designed to comply with statutory requirements, and it may require you to provide certain details or documents at account opening.
With PayTo, you can see, review and authorise all new PayTo payments for things such as recurring bills, memberships and subscriptions before the money leaves your account.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Operating in Australia with an Australian address
Must be a member of a professional association and required by law to deposit funds held on behalf of clients in statutory trust accounts
Needs an eligible business transaction account from which fees and charges can be debited.

fees.name: Account Keeping Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is $6 for Land Agent's, Broker's and Valuer's Statutory Trust Account and $0 for Solicitor's Statutory Trust Account

fees.name: Internet Banking
fees.additionalInfo: A transfer between your BankSA accounts, a transfer from your account to another account held within Australia, BPay and PayTo payments.

fees.name: Phone Banking
fees.additionalInfo: A transfer between your BankSA accounts, a transfer from your account to another account held within Australia and BPay payments. Excludes staff assisted transactions.

fees.name: EFTPOS
fees.additionalInfo: An eftpos transaction other than transactions undertaken on an EFT Terminal.

fees.name: Express Deposit
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is not charged for Solicitor's Trust Account.

fees.name: Direct Credit
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is not charged for Solicitor's Trust Account.

fees.name: Cheque
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged for each withdrawal relating to a cheque drawn on your account. This fee is not charged for Solicitor's Trust Account.

fees.name: Staff assisted transactions
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is not charged for Solicitor's Trust Account.

fees.name: Collection Item
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is not charged for Solicitor's Trust Account.

fees.name: Periodical Payment
fees.additionalInfo: A transfer of funds that we make on a regular basis at your request from your account to another specific account. This is not applicable for Solicitor's Trust Account.

fees.name: Frequent Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged for each additional statement provided to you. The fee is charged on the last business day of the month in which the additional statement is provided.
